A drink made from a root grown in the South Pacific islands that you can actually feel LEARN MORE what is kava nectar? made of plants üå± Kava Nectar is a powder crafted through the cold pressing of freshly harvested kava roots, yielding a pure, fresh kava juice. This juice is then meticulously dried and transformed into a fine powder using a proprietary process. Made exclusively from 100% natural kava root juice, Kava Nectar contains no fillers, additives, or preservatives, ensuring a lovely experience. ‚òÄÔ∏è comes from halfway across the world ‚úàÔ∏è Kava Nectar is made from the roots of kava plants. The kava plants are organically grown and cultivated for several years on the rich, volcanic islands of Vanuatu. These islands provide the ideal environment for growing high-quality kava nectar. üèùÔ∏è tastes earthy (like a stronger matcha) üçµ Kava Nectar is naturally earthy because it is made from the roots of plants. It tastes like a strong matcha, with hints of lemongrass, pepper, and cashew ‚Äì earthy and smooth üåé like coffee's sister for relaxation üõÅ Kava Nectar promotes feelings of happiness and sociability while keeping your mind continuously calm. We liken the effects of natural kava root to coffee, but with the opposite effect‚Äîpromoting relaxation instead. Natural kava root has been enjoyed socially and ceremonially for its calming properties for centuries in the South Pacific and Hawaii. tingles your tongue üëÖ Don‚Äôt be alarmed, you‚Äôre not having an allergic reaction! Kava nectar delightfully tingles your tongue while you‚Äôre drinking it, because the kava plants ‚Äì which make kava nectar ‚Äì are related to the peppercorn plant. TRY THE TINGLE SHOP KAVA NECTAR explore our menu Our menu offers specialty kava nectar cocktails, traditional kava nectar, and 100% Hawaiian Kona coffee, along with ceremonial matcha (Kona coffee & ceremonial matcha available until 6 PM daily). Food options include freshly steamed dim sum and other island snacks available day and night. VIEW MENU about us Learn more about our mission, kava nectar, and the welcoming community we‚Äôve built in Los Angeles and beyond. ABOUT US SHOP Kava Nectar KAVA NECTAR SHIPS TO ALL 50 STATES & CANADA. SHOP ALL Learn more about Kava Nectar and Kava Plants Explore our articles covering everything from the history of Kava Nectar to health benefits, pharmacology, and recipes. ARTICLES Get in touch Get in touch using our general contact form, or complete one of the following forms if your request is specific. FOR ONLINE ORDERS, PLEASE USE ORDERS@KAVAHANA.COM FOR THE QUICKEST SERVICE. Wholesale Kava Nectar Account Our wholesale program is reserved for non alcoholic lounges, cafes, coffee shops, gyms, kava bars, smoothie bars, and wellness/grocery retailers at this time. WHOLESALE APPLICATION FORM Host an event at Kavahana (Santa Monica) We host a variety of events, including concerts/live music, paint and sip, art classes, book releases, company events, birthday parties, fundraisers, and private parties, among others. About us As an Employee Ownership Trust (EOT) we strive to be a sustainable and ethical company to work for and do business with. Our core team, strategic partners and network of freelancers are committed and driven because they have a vested interest in our success. We aim to help businesses not just grow, but thrive. We achieve this through creative, thoughtful, honest, and transparent methods. At Kava, you won‚Äôt encounter industry jargon or empty promises ‚Äì only clear, expert advice and skilfully executed marketing and communication campaigns.
